original_text: You should now see a clear and direct option to cancel your current plan.
units: You should now see a clear and direct option to cancel your current plan .

original_text: Once you initiate the cancellation, you will receive both an email and an SMS confirmation within the next five minutes to confirm that your request has been successfully processed.
units: Once you initiate the cancellation , you will receive both an email and an SMS confirmation within the next five minutes to confirm that your request has been successfully processed .
to confirm that your request has been successfully processed
that your request has been successfully processed

original_text: For our internal analysis and to help us improve our services, we will also record the reason for your cancellation.
units: to help us improve our services
For our internal analysis and to help us improve our services , we will also record the reason for your cancellation .

original_text: We value your feedback and may reach out separately to gather more details about your experience.
units: We value your feedback and may reach out separately to gather more details about your experience .
may reach out separately to gather more details about your experience
